## Container.registerResolver() method

Registers a resolver with the container for the specified key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerResolver<K extends Key, T = K>(key: K, resolver: Resolver<T>): Resolver<T>;
```

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

key


</td><td>

K


</td><td>

The key to register the resolver under.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

resolver


</td><td>

[Resolver](../fast-element.resolver/)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;


</td><td>

The resolver to register.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Resolver](../fast-element.resolver/)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
